about_the_game:
Do you like me?

Actually...
I really, really like you.

If we both have feelings for each other,
then it has to be fate.

The people in Elrentaros have been acting different lately?!
Everyone seems eager to express their love to the protagonist?!
The answer may lie within the dungeons that have appeared suddenly.
What is the objective of the new character that has crept into the dungeon?

Challenge this DLC-exclusive new dungeon as much as possible to unravel the mystery, and restore peace in the town!

*To play this DLC content, the main game (sold separately) is required.
*This dungeon will be available to challenge once the first dungeon in the story is cleared.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core(TM) i3-4330
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek high definition audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core(TM) i3-4330
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek high definition audio
